systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

createdBy.Description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.Description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.Description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedAt.Description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning state of the resource at the time the operation was called.

compute.Description: Compute resource used by application environment resource.

useDevRecipes.Description: Flag to use radius owned recipes.

resourceId.Description: The resource id of the compute resource for application environment.

kind.Description: Configuration for supported external identity providers

oidcIssuer.Description: The URI for your compute platform's OIDC issuer

resource.Description: The resource ID of the provisioned identity

namespace.Description: The namespace to use for the environment.

scope.Description: Target scope for Azure resources to be deployed into.  For example: '/subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/testGroup'

linkType.Description: Type of the link this recipe can be consumed by. For example: 'Applications.Link/mongoDatabases'

templatePath.Description: Path to the template provided by the recipe. Currently only link to Azure Container Registry is supported.

annotations.Description: Annotations to be applied to the Kubernetes resources output by the resource

labels.Description: Labels to be applied to the Kubernetes resources output by the resource

kind.Description: Specifies the extensions of a resource.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning state of the resource at the time the operation was called.

environment.Description: The resource id of the environment linked to application.

labels.Description: Labels to be applied to the Kubernetes resources output by the resource

kind.Description: Specifies the extensions of a resource.

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning state of the resource at the time the operation was called.

hostname.Description: The internal hostname accepting traffic for the HTTP Route. Readonly.

port.Description: The port number for the HTTP Route. Defaults to 80. Readonly.

scheme.Description: The scheme used for traffic. Readonly.

url.Description: A stable URL that that can be used to route traffic to a resource. Readonly.

environment.Description: The resource id of the environment linked to the resource

application.Description: Specifies the resource id of the application

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning state of the resource at the time the operation was called.

internal.Description: Sets Gateway to not be exposed externally (no public IP address associated). Defaults to false (exposed to internet).

hostname.Description: Declare hostname information for the Gateway. Leaving the hostname empty auto-assigns one: mygateway.myapp.PUBLICHOSTNAMEORIP.nip.io.

url.Description: URL of the gateway resource. Readonly.

environment.Description: The resource id of the environment linked to the resource

application.Description: Specifies the resource id of the application

prefix.Description: Specify a prefix for the hostname: myhostname.myapp.PUBLICHOSTNAMEORIP.nip.io. Mutually exclusive with 'fullyQualifiedHostname' and will be overridden if both are defined.

fullyQualifiedHostname.Description: Specify a fully-qualified domain name: myapp.mydomain.com. Mutually exclusive with 'prefix' and will take priority if both are defined.

sslPassThrough.Description: If true, gateway lets the https traffic passthrough to the backend servers for decryption.

path.Description: The path to match the incoming request path on. Ex - /myservice.

destination.Description: The HttpRoute to route to. Ex - myserviceroute.id.

replacePrefix.Description: Optionally update the prefix when sending the request to the service. Ex - replacePrefix: '/' and path: '/myservice' will transform '/myservice/myroute' to '/myroute'

systemData.Description: Metadata pertaining to creation and last modification of the resource.

location.Description: The geo-location where the resource lives

provisioningState.Description: Provisioning state of the resource at the time the operation was called.

environment.Description: The resource id of the environment linked to the resource

application.Description: Specifies the resource id of the application

kind.Description: The kind of IAM provider to configure

roles.Description: RBAC permissions to be assigned on the source resource

image.Description: The registry and image to download and run in your container

command.Description: Entrypoint array. Overrides the container image's ENTRYPOINT

args.Description: Arguments to the entrypoint. Overrides the container image's CMD

protocol.Description: Protocol in use by the port

provides.Description: Specifies a route provided by this port

initialDelaySeconds.Description: Initial delay in seconds before probing for readiness/liveness

failureThreshold.Description: Threshold number of times the probe fails after which a failure would be reported

periodSeconds.Description: Interval for the readiness/liveness probe in seconds

timeoutSeconds.Description: Number of seconds after which the readiness/liveness probe times out. Defaults to 5 seconds

command.Description: Command to execute to probe readiness/liveness

path.Description: The route to make the HTTP request on

headers.Description: Custom HTTP headers to add to the get request

mountPath.Description: The path where the volume is mounted

managedStore.Description: Backing store for the ephemeral volume

permission.Description: Container read/write access to the volume

appPort.Description: The Dapr appPort. Specifies the internal listening port for the application to handle requests from the Dapr sidecar.

appId.Description: The Dapr appId. Specifies the identifier used by Dapr for service invocation.

config.Description: Specifies the Dapr configuration to use for the resource.

protocol.Description: Protocol in use by the port

provides.Description: Specifies the resource id of a dapr.io.InvokeHttpRoute that can route traffic to this resource.

kind.Description: Specifies the extensions of a resource.

annotations.Description: Annotations to be applied to the Kubernetes resources output by the resource

labels.Description: Labels to be applied to the Kubernetes resources output by the resource

certificates.Description: The KeyVault certificates that this volume exposes

keys.Description: The KeyVault keys that this volume exposes

resource.Description: The ID of the keyvault to use for this volume resource

secrets.Description: The KeyVault secrets that this volume exposes

alias.Description: File name when written to disk.

certType.Description: Certificate object type to be downloaded - the certificate itself, private key or public key of the certificate
